a.n: A sky too far to see

p.k: Real Life Story, Art Japan (2011). Hrají: Ryu Morioka, Natsuki Okamoto, Daichi Watanabe. Režie: Norio Enomoto.
p.d: Ken (Ryu Morioka) directs his graduation film "Koko ni Iru Dake" with his colleagues. The movie will be his last film as a student. While shooting the movie, Ken has conflicts with lead actress Risa (Natsuki Okamoto). On the last day of their filming, their final scene is delayed due to rain. The day before filming resumes, Risa dies in an accident. One year later, Ken's graduation film sits unfinished. Then, Ken spots a woman who looks identical to Risa who turns out to be her twin sister Yoko (Natsuki Okamoto). Ken then decides to shoot the final scene with Yoko in place of Risa, but, once again, things don't go according to plan.
